name: UNDERCLASS UK - Kill the Poor
description:
PLL000 Underclass UK - Kill The Poor Promo CD.

Strictly Limited Edition collectors item. Promotional CD of Underclass UK's controversial 2nd album, Kill The Poor. Comes in DVD style jewel case, with full lyric insert.

This band have issue all their material free of charge on the Internet, and CD copies of their work are very limited and hard to come by. When these are gone, they are gone - grab for a stupid proce NOW!

"With a blatantly blue collar outlook on the world, blended with a seriously street punk sound that doesn't hide from its metal or glam roots, Underclass UK's Kill the Poor is an exemplary representative of the British street scene" About.Com 2012

name: STREETPUNK - The Movie
description:
PLL003 - StreetPunk - The Movie DVD
A two hour monster movie which on a two year Free Load on You Tube ran up over 115k Hits!! Available exclusively on DVD, ONLY FROM HERE!!

Comes in Crass style fold-out paper cover with exclusive directors notes on the making of the movie...
